learning_objectives: Understand the fundamentals of Asynchronous replication
Apply Asynchronous replication in practical scenarios
sections.background: NoSQL replication is often a log-based Asynchronous replication, so that data can be written to a node as soon as possible, rather than being delayed by network transmission.

metadata.concept_definition: NoSQL replication is often a log-based Asynchronous replication, so that data can be written to a node as soon as possible, rather than being delayed by network transmission.
